SEARCH
Module klotski_ids
Package klotski_ids.models

Class Component

java.lang.Object
klotski_ids.models.Component
public class Component extends Object
This class represents a component in a grid, with its properties such as ID, position, size, and span.

    • Component

      public Component(String id, int row, int col, int colSpan, int rowSpan, int width, int height)
      Constructs a new Components object with the specified properties.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the component
      row - the row position of the component
      col - the column position of the component
      colSpan - the column span of the component
      rowSpan - the row span of the component
      width - the width of the component
      height - the height of the component

    • toSolverFormatString

      public String toSolverFormatString()
      Converts the Component to a string representation in the solver format. The solver format represents the shape and coordinates of the Component.
      Returns:
      the string representation of the Component in the solver format

    • coordsToString

      private String coordsToString()
      Converts the row and column coordinates of the Component to a string representation.
      Returns:
      the string representation of the coordinates in the format "X Y\n"
